            <h3 class="cd__headline" data-analytics="_carousel-medium-strip_video_video">

            <h3 class="cd__headline" data-analytics="_carousel-medium-strip_video_video">
             <a href="/videos/world/2015/07/14/nd-iran-eu-us-nuclear-deal-sot.cnn/video/playlists/iran-nuclear-negotiations/">
              <span class="cd__headline-text">
               Iran nuclear deal announced
              </span>
              <span class="cd__headline-icon">
              </span>
             </a>
            </h3>
           </div>

         </article>

               <img alt="The tunel that el Chapo used to escape" class="media__image" src="http://i2.cdn.turner.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/150712212121-02-chapo-tunnel-large-169.jpg"/>
              </noscript>
              <i aria-hidden="true" class="media__icon icon-media-video" data-post-text="2:39">
              </i>
             </a>
            </div>
            <div class="cd__content">

             <h3 class="cd__headline" data-analytics="Pope%20Francis%20(15)_carousel-medium-strip_video_video">
              <a href="/videos/world/2015/02/06/pkg-soares-pope-spanking-comments.cnn/video/playlists/pope-francis/">
               <span class="cd__headline-text">
                Pope says it's OK to spank children
               </span>
               <span class="cd__headline-icon">
               </span>
              </a>
             </h3>
            </div>
           </div>
          </article>
         </div>

The referendum gives the Greek population the opportunity to vote for or against acceptance of reforms demanded by the troika of the European Central Bank, the International Monetary Fund and the European Commission.                <img alt="German Chancellor Angela Merkel attends a session of the Bundestag on July 3, 2015 in Berlin, Germany. " class="media__image" src="http://i2.cdn.turner.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/150707160733-angela-merkel-large-169.jpg"/>

              <i aria-hidden="true" class="media__icon icon-media-video" data-post-text="3:17">
              </i>
             </a>
            </div>

              </noscript>
              <i aria-hidden="true" class="media__icon icon-media-video" data-post-text="2:58">
              </i>
             </a>
            </div>

              </i>
             </a>

Royal Air Force aircraft at RAF Lossiemouth launched the Quick Reaction Alert (QRA) for the first time since the Moray base took on the role of defending the UK&#39;s Northern airspace. Typhoon jets were scrambled to identify aircraft in international airspace. The aircraft, identified as Russian military &#39;Bears&#39;, did not enter UK airspace." class="media__image media__image--responsive" data-eq-pts="mini: 0,  xsmall: 221,  small: 308,  medium: 461,  large:  781" data-src-full16x9="http://i2.cdn.turner.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/150129113231-uk-typhoon-russian-bear-bomber-full-169.jpg" data-src-large="http://i2.cdn.turner.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/150129113231-uk-typhoon-russian-bear-bomber-super-169.jpg" data-src-medium="http://i2.cdn.turner.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/150129113231-uk-typhoon-russian-bear-bomber-exlarge-169.jpg" data-src-mini="http://i2.cdn.turner.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/150129113231-uk-typhoon-russian-bear-bomber-small-169.jpg" data-src-mini1x1="http://i2.cdn.turner.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/150129113231-uk-typhoon-russian-bear-bomber-small-11.jpg" data-src-small="http://i2.cdn.turner.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/150129113231-uk-typhoon-russian-bear-bomber-large-169.jpg" data-src-xsmall="http://i2.cdn.turner.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/150130003231-uk-typhoon-russian-bear-bomber-medium-plus-169.jpg" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhEAAJAJEAAAAAAP///////wAAACH5BAEAAAIALAAAAAAQAAkAAAIKlI+py+0Po5yUFQA7"/>

               <img alt="smart bullet change direction mid-air orig nws_00010016.jpg" class="media__image" src="http://i2.cdn.turner.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/150129180257-smart-bullet-change-direction-mid-air-orig-nws-00010016-large-169.jpg"/>

              </i>
             </a>

              <img alt="(FILES) In this March 27, 2013 file photo, Gay pride flags flying at the US Supreme Court in Washington, DC. Alabama became the 37th US state to allow gay marriagesFebruary 9, 2015 after the US Supreme Court refused to take up an appeal to block them. The southern state had asked the top court to halt the unions until it rules on same-sex marriages nationwide later this year. But the Supreme Court declined to hear the state&#39;s case, and probate judges began issuing marriage licenses and officiating weddings. Two of the nine Supreme Court justices dissented from the majority&#39;s decision.                <img alt="john kerry iran nuclear deal amanpour intvw_00011507.jpg" class="media__image" src="http://i2.cdn.turner.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/150714111311-john-kerry-iran-nuclear-deal-amanpour-intvw-00011507-large-169.jpg"/>

          </div>
         </article>

          <article class="cd cd--video cd--video cd--idx-0 cd--large cd--vertical cd--has-siblings cd--has-media" data-eq-pts="xsmall: 0, small: 300, medium: 460, large: 780, full16x9: 1100" data-video-id="sports/2015/06/18/spc-open-court-wimbledon-real-estate.cnn" data-vr-contentbox="/videos/sports/2015/06/18/spc-open-court-wimbledon-real-estate.cnn">

              <a href="/videos/world/2014/07/15/spc-art-of-movement-solar-flares.cnn">

               </span>
               <span class="cd__headline-icon">
               </span>
              </a>
             </h3>
             <div class="cd__description">

            <div class="cd__content">
             <h3 class="cd__headline" data-analytics="_jumbotron-container_video_video">
              <a href="/videos/business/2014/08/29/spc-make-create-innovate-hoverbike.cnn">
               <span class="cd__headline-text" id="js-20-headlineText-jumbotron-card-20">
                The world's first 'flying motorcycle'?
               </span>
               <span class="cd__headline-icon">
               </span>
              </a>
             </h3>
             <div class="cd__description">
              Engineer Chris Malloy has created a hoverbike, which could help out in disaster zones in the future.
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
          </article>
         </div>
         <div class="js-jumbotron-card-wrapper jumbotron-card-wrapper inactive-card" id="container_C2B93154-6F0C-2C11-78F1-05F481A681DD-jumbotron-card-21">

              <a href="/videos/sports/2014/10/08/spc-human-hero-emelie-forsberg.cnn">

               </span>
               <span class="cd__headline-icon">
               </span>
              </a>
